title: New age tech companies going public, ESG landscape key challenges to capital markets: SEBI chief - Moneycontrol.com
content: New age tech companies going public, ESG landscape key challenges to capital markets: SEBI chief  Moneycontrol.com
description: In addition, the flourishing landscape of ESG (environment, social, governance) investments is another major challenge to the capital markets due to absence of uniform ESG evaluation matrices, Ajay Tyagi said.
